name: Hernán Ariel Domínguez
title: Full-Stack Developer
about_description: I am a dedicated professional with experience in full-stack development, which means I not only master the server and client sides but also have a comprehensive understanding of the entire software development process. My focus is on delivering complete and scalable solutions.

contact.address: José C. Paz, Buenos Aires, Argentina

education_description: My educational journey has been an exciting voyage of self-discovery and intellectual growth. Attaining my Bachelor's degree in Information Technology Management at the National University of José C. Paz has been a significant milestone in my ongoing quest for knowledge and excellence.

My thesis project, 'Online Voting System Based on Blockchain', was a testament to my dedication to research and my ability to address complex issues with an analytical and creative approach. This experience solidified my passion for programming and prepared me to tackle challenges in the field in an innovative manner.
Throughout my educational trajectory, I have embraced every opportunity to learn and grow, and I am eager to apply this knowledge and these skills in my ever-evolving professional career.

experience_description: During my professional journey, I have had the opportunity to face various challenges that have significantly contributed to my professional development. At each stage, I have learned valuable lessons that have enriched my skills and knowledge.

I started my career with a sense of curiosity and a willingness to take on responsibilities. As I took on new tasks, I encountered situations that required creative solutions and an ability to adapt to changing environments. Versatility became a key skill that I developed over time.

Collaborating with colleagues from diverse disciplines and participating in multidisciplinary projects provided me with a deeper understanding of the importance of teamwork. I learned to appreciate the diversity of opinions and leverage a variety of skills to achieve common goals more efficiently.

Furthermore, time management became an essential aspect of my work experience. Learning to prioritize tasks, set realistic deadlines, and maintain a balance between efficiency and quality became crucial in a dynamic work environment.

Over the years, I have faced challenges that, although they may have seemed intimidating at the time, transformed into opportunities for growth. These challenges not only provided me with technical and practical knowledge but also strengthened my resilience and ability to overcome obstacles.
